SEARCH
Package gw.cc.financials.reserve.entity

Interface Reserve

All Superinterfaces:
MayUseDeprecatedExchangeRates, Transaction
public interface Reserve extends Transaction
Reserve A reserve transaction (any transaction that designates money for payments).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Reserve[]
    getGroupedReserves()
    Retrieves all Reserves from this reserve's TransactionSet, regardless of whether the reserves are part of a ReserveSet, or if they are instead associated with a CheckSet (as CheckSetReserves).
    Payment
    getOffsetPayment()
    If this Reserve exists to offset a payment directly, because the payment exceeds reserves, this method returns the payment being offset.
    boolean
    isZeroingOffset()
    Returns whether this reserve is a zeroing offset, i.e. if its offset payment is not null.

    Methods inherited from interface gw.api.financials.MayUseDeprecatedExchangeRates

    isUsingDeprecatedExchangeRates

    Methods inherited from interface gw.cc.financials.entity.Transaction

    acknowledgeSubmission, addNewLineItem, addToLineItems, findAndSetReserveLine, getAmount, getClaimAmount, getDetailPageTitle, getOverrideTransToClaimExchangeRate, getOverrideTransToReservingExchangeRate, getReportingAmount, getReservingAmount, getRoundingMode, getTransactionAmount, getTransactionAmountDirectlyLineItem, getTransactionAmountReservingAmountPair, getTransactionDate, getTransactionTypeName, getTransToClaimExchangeRateRate, getTransToReservingExchangeRateRate, isDeletable, isEditable, isNotApproved, populateTransToReservingExchangeRateInUseFromExistingRecord, removeFromLineItemsIfEditable, setClaim, setClaimToReportingExchangeRate, setClaimToReportingExchangeRateInUse, setCurrency, setOverrideTransToClaimExchangeRate, setOverrideTransToReservingExchangeRate, setReserveLine, setReservingCurrency, setTransToClaimExchangeRate, setTransToClaimExchangeRateInUse, setTransToClaimExchangeRateRate, setTransToReservingExchangeRate, setTransToReservingExchangeRateInUse, setTransToReservingExchangeRateRate

  • Method Details

    • getGroupedReserves

      Reserve[] getGroupedReserves()
      Retrieves all Reserves from this reserve's TransactionSet, regardless of whether the reserves are part of a ReserveSet, or if they are instead associated with a CheckSet (as CheckSetReserves).
      Returns:
      an array of Reserves

    • getOffsetPayment

      Payment getOffsetPayment()
      If this Reserve exists to offset a payment directly, because the payment exceeds reserves, this method returns the payment being offset. If no such payment exists, this method returns NULL.
      Returns:
      the Payment being offset by this Reserve, if any.

    • isZeroingOffset

      boolean isZeroingOffset()
      Returns whether this reserve is a zeroing offset, i.e. if its offset payment is not null.
      Returns:
      true if this reserve is a zeroing offset
